definitions.body: Impf. in rel. cl., [[בְּעֵת יְזֽׁרְבוּ נִחְמָָתוּ]] Job 6:17 (‖[[בְּחֻמּוֹ]] [[נִדְעֲכוּ מִמְּקוֹמָם]]), of brooks scorched and drying up (‖ form of [[חָרַב]] q.v.; so Ew Di De Hoffm Kau AV RV MV; >Thes RobGes who comp. Ar. zariba flow away, cf. NH [[זְרִיבָה]]; and Mich Dl:Pr 36 f. VBm (are straitened) RVm (shrink) cf. Aram. zrab compress, (Ar. zariba is to make a wooden enclosure), As. zarâbu, Zim:BP 32 n. 56, 70, 95).
